column2: "Confirmed arrival on Omega. We're in the southern plains of Cuent."
"...But, why's there a battle going on right here?!"
"Wow wow wow wow wow, how very fun it looks looks. Which side should Lisa shoot first?"
"...Wait, look closely! Those are...!"
"Photoner weapons?!"
"Why are they here?!"
"Oh my my, so the enemies were the first ones to arrive here?"
"We should speak with Margareta first. Everyone, to me!"
"Transient wings, come forth! Exit!"
"Nothing is working! Nothing is working!"
"Ooogh we're too shorthanded! I'd even accept help from a fairy at this point!"
"Won't someone please come help!"
"Wh-, Something's here?!"
"Margareta!"
"Harriet?! You've finally returned!"
"With the Guardian and fairy?! And this frightening thing... This smells of a rotten situation."
"A swift explanation will suffice. But first tell us of your situation. Where have those enemies come from?"
"...The lake where that black cocoon was. It was wise of us to leave the fortresses used during the battle with Elmir."
"Ah, we have already evacuated the citizens in the area. There is nothing to worry about on that end."
"Next, allow me to ask you a question... What are those things? Do you have some relation with them?"
"...I see, so some wicked superbeing from the Guardian's world has been causing all of these troubles."
"And now we have been dragged into it? Hurry and defeat them at once."
"We would if we were able to."
"But we never expected the Photoners to appear in this world as well."
"No no no no, isn't it obvious? This is essentially the contents of the Akashic Record."
"So why wouldn't something happening in Lisa's world also happen here?"
"Time is synchronized with Oracle's side, so the effects occur in real time..."
"Oracle's history has already been recorded, and the effects are being reproduced in Omega."
"This business sounds quite complicated, but are you saying that our problems will not vanish until yours are solved?"
"That's condensing things quite a bit, but in essence, yes."
"We were dragged into this mess, but our lots are now cast together. So, what should we do?"
"Harriet is making preparations for that right now."
"...I have returned."
"Welcome back, Harriet. Did it go well?"
"Of the six spirit veins that support this world, I have gained control of five of them."
"However, I am unable to reach the remaining one with my powers... It seems we have no choice but to seize it through direct means."
"...I'm getting a bad feeling about this."
"...What a coincidence, fairy. I'm getting that very same feeling."
"Could that place be...?"
"Is it the location of the black cocoon...?"
"...Yes. As you surmised, it is the location our enemies have gathered. The very spot that the black cocoon once stood."
"It was once used for healing purposes due to its location at the center of the spirit veins. But Elmir abused it in his desire for power."
"Now the entire region lies outside the influence of my divine powers."
"In other words, we'll need to part the sea of enemies ourselves to reach the center."
"...We did that not too long ago."
"Hehehehe. We're headed straight to the spot with lots of enemies."
"So so Lisa will get to shoot shoot shoot all all all of them?"
"Ah, how exciting! So exciting! Lisa gets to enjoy a front row seat on the frontlines."
"...Fairy, is that thing okay? It's giving me a nasty feeling... We're not going to get shot, are we?"
"Do not avert your gaze! It does not inspire confidence!"
"Don't worry about a thing. Three or fewer misfired shots doesn't count as friendly fire."
"If you're doing it on purpose, all your shots are friendly fire!"
"This is way more worrying than last time! If only the sword maiden wasn't off in Verun right now...!"
"Ohhh fine, there's no time for uncertainty! If we have to get this done then let us get it done! We move! Hurry, hurry!"
